thread.title: Sharks' Tomas Hertl motivated to bounce back in third season

title: Sharks' Tomas Hertl motivated to bounce back in third season
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: NHL - Today 
Hertl had 13 goals in a full season last year; he already has one in 2015-16. ...
